languages.text: "О да! Знаменитый идексовский жемчуг откровений — сам часто им пользуюсь, чтобы держать разум распахнутым к новым идеям".

traits.locale_text: "Господин судья, не беспокойтесь, все импортно-экспортные свитки должны храниться у моего казначея. А ежели он их не найдет — велю отрубить ему голову!"

languages.text: "Oh, yes! The famous Idexian pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."
languages.original_text: "О да! Знаменитый идексовский жемчуг откровений — сам часто им пользуюсь, чтобы держать разум распахнутым к новым идеям".

traits.locale_text: "Oh, yes! The famous Idex pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."
"Oh, yes! The famous Idex pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."
"Oh, yes! The famous Idex pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."
"Oh, yes! The famous Idex pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."
"Oh, yes! The famous Idexian pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."
"Oh, yes! The famous Idexian pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."

languages.text: “噢，没错！这就是赫赫有名的艾德克斯珍珠。我自己也常会通过它的启发，想出充满创意的点子。”
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes! The famous Idexian pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."

traits.locale_text: “噢，没错！这就是赫赫有名的艾德克斯珍珠。我自己也常会通过它的启发，想出充满创意的点子。”

languages.text: «¡Oh, sí! Las famosas perlas idexianas de la revelación. Las uso a menudo para abrir mi mente a nuevas ideas».
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes! The famous Idexian pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."

traits.locale_text: «¡Oh, sí! Las famosas perlas idexianas de la revelación. Las uso a menudo para abrir mi mente a nuevas ideas».

languages.text: "Biliyorum! İdeks'in ünlü vahiy incileri. Zihnimi yeni fikirlere açık tutmak için sürekli takarım."
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes! The famous Idexian pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."

traits.locale_text: "Biliyorum! İdeks'in ünlü vahiy incileri. Zihnimi yeni fikirlere açık tutmak için sürekli takarım."

languages.text: 「あぁ、はい！有名なイデックスのお告げの真珠ですね。私は、新しいアイデアを受け入れるマインドを保つために自分で使うことが多いですね」
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes! The famous Idexian pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ、はい！有名なイデックスのお告げの真珠ですね。私は、新しいアイデアを受け入れるマインドを保つために自分で使うことが多いですね」

languages.text: « Oh, oui ! Les très célèbres perles de révélation idéxiennes. J'en fais moi-même souvent usage pour rester réceptif aux nouvelles idées. »
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes! The famous Idexian pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."

traits.locale_text: « Oh, oui ! Les très célèbres perles de révélation idéxiennes. J'en fais moi-même souvent usage pour rester réceptif aux nouvelles idées. »

languages.text: "Oh, ja! Die berühmten idexianischen Perlen der Offenbarung. Ich nutze sie selbst oft, um meinen Verstand für neue Ideen zu öffnen."
languages.original_text: "Oh, yes! The famous Idexian pearls of revelation. I often use them myself to keep my mind receptive to new ideas."

traits.locale_text: "Oh, ja! Die berühmten idexianischen Perlen der Offenbarung. Ich nutze sie selbst oft, um meinen Verstand für neue Ideen zu öffnen."
